subject: v1.19.20 on TEST - NOT PROD yet
body:
Team,

v1.19.20 is on TEST with two changes:

1. **HTML-level version check** - Forces stale cached browsers to refresh (fixes users seeing old 'We Are Back' modal)

2. **appId added to VisitorTrack** - Per Fulton's request, now sends appId to /api/visitor/track

Holding on PROD until Fulton confirms backend is ready for appId.

- Sarah
